name: CT-34
notes:
Loosely based on the DOG STAR (by Philip Rhodes) of the late 1920's (which later became the TRAVELLER 32 - also built by Ta Chiao at this time at the behest of Seacomber, Inc.). C.S. Chen, was one of the brothers that owned the Ta Chiao boat yard at this time.
Thanks to 'crumpet', and a number of others for providing updated information on this yacht.
